item.title: How Bandwidth Fosters Productivity Improvement
item.description:
Increasing your bandwidth could be one of the quickest and most affordable ways to boost employee productivity. When your LAN and WAN bandwidth are optimized to match the speed of your business operations, you remove a major obstacle to improved performance and potentially even increase your profits. While it might seem unrelated, the effectiveness of telephone and computer networks directly impacts employee performance. item.title: How Bandwidth Can Affect Productivity
item.description:
Businesses are grappling with decisions about bandwidth allocation, often facing costs calculated per Megabit per second (Mbps). While strategies exist to maximize Mbps per dollar, it’s essential to first understand the correlation between network bandwidth and employee productivity. If your bandwidth is primarily used for non-work activities, reducing it might seem like a productivity booster.
